entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Old Crow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:17 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -41.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Old Crow Airport 10:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -41.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -45.8°C
Wind: NE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 40. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
